name: UpdateAutomationEmailSettings
description:
Update settings for a classic automation workflow email.

Use this tool to update the settings of a specific email in a classic automation workflow in Mailchimp. Applicable for workflows of type: abandonedBrowse, abandonedCart, emailFollowup, or singleWelcome.

parameters.name: automation_workflow_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Automation workflow to be updated.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the Automation workflow.

parameters.name: automation_workflow_email_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the Automation workflow email to update.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the Automation workflow email.

parameters.name: automation_email_settings
parameters.description: JSON object with settings such as subject line, preview text, title, from name, reply-to email, and delay configurations. Used to update automation email settings.

subject_line.description: The subject line for the campaign.

preview_text.description: The preview text for the campaign.

from_name.description: The 'from' name for the Automation (not an email address).

reply_to.description: The reply-to email address for the Automation.

settings.description: Settings for the campaign including the email subject, from name, and from email address.

amount.description: The delay amount for an automation email.

type.description: The type of delay for an automation email.

direction.description: Whether the delay settings describe before or after the delay action of an automation email.

action.description: The action that triggers the delay of an automation emails.

delay.description: The delay settings for an automation email.
